```{r load_pkgs, include=FALSE}
library(fastqcr)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Quality Control

```{r read_qc, include=FALSE}
qc <- qc_aggregate("./")
raw_file <- qc_read("IonTorrent_fastqc.zip")
trimmed_file <- qc_read("IonTorrentTrimmed_fastqc.zip")
```

## summary statistics

```{r}
qc_stats(qc)
```
